text: Rasheed Masood (15 August 1947 - 5 October 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Indian National Congress. He was born in Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh. He was a member of the Lok Sabha between 1977 to 1984, 1989 to 1996 and from 2004 to 2009. In 1990, he was the Minister of Health and Family Welfare. Masood died on 5 October 2020 at a hospital in Roorkee, Uttarakhand from COVID-19 at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Rasheed Masood
